column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ At 11:35 pm on September 4
column5: a Chinese man had his bag snatched in front of San Sok restaurant on Russian Federation
column9: the victim had come to eat at the restaurant which belongs to a friend.  He was standing near his car when two suspects  riding a motorbike snatched his bag
column12: his passport and a bank card.------Following the incident
column13: the victim filed a complaint for the suspects to be caught prosecuted in accordance with the law. ------POST NEWS
